text: Kamavahu nurɨŋ ambami, Tɨkatɨka kuyundu mirɨmba naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ tɨkatɨka kuyu ŋgandu. Kamataharɨm Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨhɨyɨndu kuyu sapa handahara ŋgandu. Nurɨ tavɨ aru muŋandɨhinɨndu nɨŋuva maña. Tavɨhumba hañɨndu muhambu indɨhuta muhɨmɨmuhɨm nuŋandɨ avivi kuhandu naŋga kɨhi yavurɨta kɨndi haŋɨnɨŋ, sɨhanaŋga mɨŋaramahi tapɨrañɨ pindɨhami, vami.
